CustomField.description: Indicates if the timesheet will include timesheet entries for public Holidays on creation. When False, they will not be included and must be added manually to the timesheet if needed.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates if the timesheet will include timesheet entries for public Holidays on creation. When False, they will not be included and must be added manually to the timesheet if needed.
CustomField.label: Include Public Holidays?
